subject: Sales
title: Ron Popeil: The TV Sales King
description: A 1-minute de-risking session on Ron Popeil: The TV Sales King.

hook.text: Ron Popeil sold rotisserie ovens at 2 AM on TV and built a billion-dollar business.

buildup.text: He perfected the infomercial format: demonstrate, repeat the offer, add bonuses, create urgency.

discovery.text: 'Set it and forget it' became a catchphrase. Popeil proved that showing beats telling every time.

twist.text: Critics mocked him as a huckster. But he understood attention and desire better than any ad agency.

climax.text: He held over 30 patents and customers came back for more. The products actually worked.

punchline.text: He turned late-night TV into the world's biggest store.

quiz.question: What was Ron Popeil's famous catchphrase?
